apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss between two men, with light and medium-light skin tones, is depicted with tender affection and a focus on connection. The soft, rounded features of the individuals are enhanced by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving the embrace a warm and intimate feel. This emoji beautifully symbolizes love, romance, and the celebration of same-sex relationships, conveying a message of unity and heartfelt emotion with grace and visual appeal.
